companyFinancials.definition: Market cap: shares outstanding * price. Revenue: TTM.

marketIndices.source: Yahoo Finance (^GSPC, ^IXIC, SOXX, XLI) + robotics basket
marketIndices.definition: Normalized to 100 at series start. Robotics = weighted basket of NVDA, ISRG, ABB, FANUY, ROK, SYM, PATH, TSLA.

leadingIndicators.source: IFR, WIPO, LinkedIn Workforce Reports, Government programs
leadingIndicators.definition: Composite scores based on publicly available trend data

supplyChain.source: Industry reports, IFR, public supplier data
supplyChain.definition: Lead times and concentration from public supplier filings

leadingIndicators.name: Patent Momentum
leadingIndicators.description: USPTO + WIPO robotics patent filings velocity (15-20% YoY growth per WIPO 2024 report)

leadingIndicators.name: Hiring Velocity
leadingIndicators.description: Robotics job postings growth rate (LinkedIn Workforce Report)

leadingIndicators.name: Order Book Strength
leadingIndicators.description: IFR robot installations +7% in 2023; strong 2024-2025 outlook

leadingIndicators.name: Policy Tailwinds
leadingIndicators.description: CHIPS Act + EU robotics programs + Japan Society 5.0 + China "Made in 2025"

leadingIndicators.name: Supply Chain Easing
leadingIndicators.description: Component availability index - harmonic drive constraints persist

leadingIndicators.name: Earnings Sentiment
leadingIndicators.description: Robotics/automation mentions in S&P 500 earnings calls trending up

alerts.title: Harmonic drive lead time remains elevated (20+ weeks)
